title: Google, looking to ‘distinguish’ future Pixel Buds, has been buying up audio-related IP and teams
content:
Google’s first two attempts in the massive wireless audio market didn’t go over super well, but its latest release in the Pixel Buds A-Series has been well received overall. Now, in line with a desire to “distinguish” its future first-party audio products, Google has been quietly buying up audio-related IP, including an entire team from Synaptics.

more…

The post Google, looking to ‘distinguish’ future Pixel Buds, has been buying up audio-related IP and teams appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new report brings to light a buying spree from Google over the past year that saw the company acquire audio IP and staff from Synaptics
